name: browser-extensions-monorepo
description: Browser Extensions Collection by r00tmebaby - Multi-browser support (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave)
author: r00tmebaby

scripts.test:normaliser: cd Normaliser && npm install && npm test
scripts.test:uae: cd "Universal Accessibility Enhancer" && npm install && npm test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:normaliser && npm run test:uae
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:normaliser && npm run test:e2e:uae
scripts.test:e2e:normaliser: cd Normaliser && npm install && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:uae: cd "Universal Accessibility Enhancer" && npm install && npm run test:e2e
scripts.verify: npm run verify:normaliser && npm run verify:uae
scripts.verify:normaliser: cd Normaliser && npm install && npm run verify
scripts.verify:uae: cd "Universal Accessibility Enhancer" && npm install && npm run verify
scripts.build:uae: cd "Universal Accessibility Enhancer" && npm install && npm run build:all
scripts.install:all: npm run install:normaliser && npm run install:uae
scripts.clean: npm run clean:normaliser && npm run clean:uae
scripts.clean:normaliser: cd Normaliser && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules) && (if exist coverage rmdir /s /q coverage)
scripts.clean:uae: cd "Universal Accessibility Enhancer" && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules) && (if exist coverage rmdir /s /q coverage) && (if exist build rmdir /s /q build)
